jobs.title: Hugbúnaðarsérfræðingur / Software Developer
jobs.description:
Við leitum að öflugum hugbúnaðarsérfræðingi í þróunarteymið okkar. Við trúum á metnaðarfull og öflug teymi og keyrum Scrum aðferðafræði í góðri samvinnu við vörustýringarsvið fyrirtækisins. Starfið hentar þeim sem hefur brennandi áhuga á hugbúnaðargerð og leggur áherslu á nýjustu tækni, teymisvinnu og vönduð vinnubrögð.

Motus er á spennandi vegferð sem miðar að því að finna nýjar leiðir til að styrkja gæði kröfuþjónustu, svo hún verði ómissandi þáttur í vexti og viðgangi fyrirtækja á landinu öllu. Hlutverk Motus er að koma fjármagni á hreyfingu á hagkvæman, nútímalegan og aðgengilegan hátt. Við beitum til þess nýjustu tækni og sérþekkingu og leitum stöðugt bestu lausna í þágu viðskiptavina og samfélags.
jobs.bodyhtml:
Við leitum að öflugum hugbúnaðarsérfræðingi í þróunarteymið okkar. Við trúum á metnaðarfull og öflug teymi og keyrum Scrum aðferðafræði í góðri samvinnu við vörustýringarsvið fyrirtækisins. Starfið hentar þeim sem hefur brennandi áhuga á hugbúnaðargerð og leggur áherslu á nýjustu tækni, teymisvinnu og vönduð vinnubrögð.

Motus er á spennandi vegferð sem miðar að því að finna nýjar leiðir til að styrkja gæði kröfuþjónustu, svo hún verði ómissandi þáttur í vexti og viðgangi fyrirtækja á landinu öllu. Hlutverk Motus er að koma fjármagni á hreyfingu á hagkvæman, nútímalegan og aðgengilegan hátt. Við beitum til þess nýjustu tækni og sérþekkingu og leitum stöðugt bestu lausna í þágu viðskiptavina og samfélags.

jobs.title: Infrastructure Engineer
jobs.description:
CCP is looking for an Infrastructure Engineer to contribute to the continued evolution of our critically acclaimed science-fiction game EVE Online.

You will focus on creating more automatic processes around the maintenance and upgrades of EVE. This position requires an individual who loves learning and is passionate about best practices of infrastructure as code.

Your tasks:


 - Join us in our mission to support EVE Development by exploring new technologies and making a meaningful impact

 - Keep working towards practical problem solving where we prefer using industry-standard tools instead of building out our own

 - Make sure EVE Online runs as smoothly as possible

 - You will be working with other engineers creating and maintaining infrastructure to service multiple projects


Your Profile:


 - B.Sc. in Computer Science or equivalent experience

 - Experience in working in both Windows and POSIX environments

 - Experience managing and using orchestration tools (Especially Kubernetes and Nomad)

 - Preference for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) like Terraform

 - Experience using AWS


What we can offer you:


 - The inspiring challenge of working on the award winning MMO EVE Online in cooperation with amazingly talented and ambitious co-workers

 - A multicultural work environment that encourages growth, creativity, and innovation

 - Double workstation setup and flexible work environment

 - An active fun division that hosts regular events

 - An excellent canteen that offers a weekly breakfast and lunch menu as well as drinks and snacks

 - Discretionary quarterly and annual performance sharing plan

 - Annual sports grant

 - A mobile device and a mobile usage package

 - Home Internet

 - A conditional monthly transportation grant

 - Work environment that focuses on employee well-being

 - On-site doctor, free of charge as well as other on-site services at a discounted price

 - Relocation Package

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a talented developer, an individual who enjoys solving problems through good collaboration as a member of a small team
Main projects:


 - Develop and maintain our unique aviation solutions platforms.


Educational and skill requirements:



 - Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, or 4+ years relevant work experience

 - Computer Science fundamentals in object-oriented design, data structure, algorithm design, problem solving and complexity analysis

 - Clear communications in code and in writing

 - Understanding of the following technologies is required:


 - C# and .NET

 - MS Entity Framework with SQL Server and/or Oracle

 - MVC with Razor views

 - HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Jquery, JSON

 - Windows Services


 - Knowledge and understanding of mobile app architecture is an advantage

 - Knowledge of iPhone and Android mobile development is an advantage
jobs.bodyhtml: We are looking for a talented developer, an individual who enjoys solving problems through good collaboration as a member of a small team
jobs.footer:
Main projects:

  • Develop and maintain our unique aviation solutions platforms.

Educational and skill requirements: 

  • Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, or 4+ years relevant work experience
  • Computer Science fundamentals in object-oriented design, data structure, algorithm design, problem solving and complexity analysis
  • Clear communications in code and in writing
  • Understanding of the following technologies is required:
    • C# and .NET
    • MS Entity Framework with SQL Server and/or Oracle
    • MVC with Razor views
    • HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Jquery, JSON
    • Windows Services
  • Knowledge and understanding of mobile app architecture is an advantage
  • Knowledge of iPhone and Android mobile development is an advantage

jobs.title: Gagnaforritari (Data Engineer)
jobs.description:
Nova leitar að gagnaforritara sem leikur lykilhlutverk við þróun og rekstur gagnagreiningarumhverfis félagsins. Til að ná árangri þarf gagnaforritari að úrræðagóður og hugsa í lausnum. Starfið krefst mikillar samvinnu við önnur teymi og er lipurð í samskiptum því mikilvæg. Mörg verkefni krefjast skapandi hugsunar og getu til að hugsa „út fyrir kassann“ og þannig hámarka nýtingu á því skipulagi og tækni sem er í boði.
Umsóknarfrestur er til 15. nóvember

Umsókn skal fylgja ferilskrá og kynningarbréf þar sem gerð er grein fyrir ástæðu umsóknar og rökstuðningur um færni viðkomandi til að gegna starfinu.

Aðrar upplýsingar

Hjá Nova starfa um 160 dansarar sem kappkosta alla daga við það að veita framúrskarandi þjónustu. Nova státar af
ánægðustu viðskiptavinunum
á farsímamarkaði fjórtán ár í röð og hlaut nafnbótina
Fyrirtæki ársins
árið 2023, fjórða árið í röð.

Nova er skemmtilegur og sveigjanlegur vinnustaður, þar sem ákaflega mikið er lagt upp úr sjálfstæðum vinnubrögðum, skemmtilegu samfélagi starfsfólks, góðum starfsanda og liðsheild. Við elskum að skora á okkur sjálf og hvert annað. Kíktu baksviðs hjá Nova ef þú vilt vita meira og af hverju þú ættir að vinna hjá Nova.
https://www.nova.is/baksvids/fyrirtaekid

jobs.title: Bakendaforritari og Linux nörd með áhuga á fjarskiptum
jobs.description:
Nova leitar að reyndum og metnaðarfullum forritara og Linux nörd til að taka dansinn í bakendaforritun, samþáttun kerfa og rekstri á farsímakjarna og tengdum kerfum.

Nova rekur eitt stærsta og öflugasta 4G og 5G farnetskerfi á Íslandi og fer um 60% netnotkunar á farneti fer yfir fjarskiptakerfi Nova á hverju ári og jafnframt því rekur Nova eigið burðarnetskerfi hringinn í kringum landið. Markmið Nova er að bjóða viðskiptavinum sínum upp á bestu notendaupplifun á markaðnum og hefur verið leiðandi í innleiðingu á nýrri tækni á undanförnum árum.
Umsóknarfrestur er til 15. nóvember

Umsókn skal fylgja ferilskrá og kynningarbréf þar sem gerð er grein fyrir ástæðu umsóknar og rökstuðningur um færni viðkomandi til að gegna starfinu.

Hjá Nova starfa um 160 dansarar sem kappkosta alla daga við það að veita framúrskarandi þjónustu. Nova státar af ánægðustu viðskiptavinunum
á farsímamarkaði fjórtán ár í röð og hlaut nafnbótina
Fyrirtæki ársins
árið 2023, fjórða árið í röð.

jobs.title: Quality Assurance Specialist
jobs.description:
Role Overview


As a Quality Assurance Specialist at 50skills, you will play a crucial role in maintaining and enhancing the quality and reliability of our products. You'll be an essential member of our team, contributing to the growth of our QA practices while ensuring our products continue to meet the highest standards of quality.


Responsibilities



 - 
Collaborate with the development team to foster a culture of quality at 50skills


 - 
Work closely with our product team at all stages of development


 - 
Contribute to the testing efforts during the development of our products


 - 
Help shape and build our products


 - 
Design, implement and execute manual test plans


 - 
Be an integral part of our release pipeline with testing of new features and reported bug reproductions


 - 
Support the creation and execution of automated tests as directed and deemed fit


 - 
Encourage efficiency and performance of our development processes







Experience and skills



 - 
A strong desire to grow and learn in the field of quality assurance


 - 
Attention to detail and a passion for problem-solving


 - 
An appreciation for design detail and a focus on user experience


 - 
A positive attitude and eagerness to contribute to a collaborative team environment







Nice to have



 - 
Experience or familiarity with creating end-to-end tests using frameworks such as Playwright, Cypress or Selenium


 - 
Exposure to working in a startup or smaller company environment


 - 
Educational background in computer science or a related technical field







Perks & Benefits



 - 
We have a
family-friendly
work environment with a flexible work-from-home policy


 - 
You get to pick the equipment you need or want


 - 
Coverage for mobile and home internet expenses


 - 
Enjoy breakfast and lunch at the office, ensuring you're fueled for success


 - 
Bus membership (we support employees who use public transportation)







About our product


50skills is committed to automating people processes to create extraordinary employee experiences. Our platform is engineered to boost productivity and improve employee journeys. Resources and comprehensive training are in place to equip you for success.






Be a part of something big - join the 50skills adventure!
jobs.bodyhtml:
Role Overview
As a Quality Assurance Specialist at 50skills, you will play a crucial role in maintaining and enhancing the quality and reliability of our products. You'll be an essential member of our team, contributing to the growth of our QA practices while ensuring our products continue to meet the highest standards of quality.
 
Responsibilities
  • Collaborate with the development team to foster a culture of quality at 50skills
  • Work closely with our product team at all stages of development
  • Contribute to the testing efforts during the development of our products
  • Help shape and build our products
  • Design, implement and execute manual test plans
  • Be an integral part of our release pipeline with testing of new features and reported bug reproductions
  • Support the creation and execution of automated tests as directed and deemed fit
  • Encourage efficiency and performance of our development processes
 
Experience and skills
  • A strong desire to grow and learn in the field of quality assurance
  • Attention to detail and a passion for problem-solving
  • An appreciation for design detail and a focus on user experience
  • A positive attitude and eagerness to contribute to a collaborative team environment
 
Nice to have
  • Experience or familiarity with creating end-to-end tests using frameworks such as Playwright, Cypress or Selenium
  • Exposure to working in a startup or smaller company environment
  • Educational background in computer science or a related technical field
 
Perks & Benefits
  • We have a family-friendly work environment with a flexible work-from-home policy
  • You get to pick the equipment you need or want
  • Coverage for mobile and home internet expenses
  • Enjoy breakfast and lunch at the office, ensuring you're fueled for success
  • Bus membership (we support employees who use public transportation)
 
About our product
50skills is committed to automating people processes to create extraordinary employee experiences. Our platform is engineered to boost productivity and improve employee journeys. Resources and comprehensive training are in place to equip you for success.
 
Be a part of something big - join the 50skills adventure!

jobs.title: Power Platform / D365 Sérfræðingur
jobs.description:
Vegna aukinna umsvifa við framleiðslu, innleiðingu og þjónustu á snjöllum lausnum fyrir viðskiptavini okkar tengdum Microsoft Power Platform og Dynamics 365 erum við að stækka hópinn.


Við leitum að kraftmiklum og metnaðarfullum einstaklingum með brennandi áhuga á hugbúnaðargerð, viðskiptagreind, gervigreind, gagnavinnslu, tölfræði og sjálfvirknivæðingu.

Ef þú ert með bakgrunn í tölvunarfræði, hugbúnaðarverkfræði og/eða góða færni í forritun og með löngun til að taka þátt í verkefnum með mörgum af öflugustu fyrirtækjum á íslandi þá er þetta tækifæri fyrir þig.
jobs.bodyhtml:
Vegna aukinna umsvifa við framleiðslu, innleiðingu og þjónustu á snjöllum lausnum fyrir viðskiptavini okkar tengdum Microsoft Power Platform og Dynamics 365 erum við að stækka hópinn. 

Við leitum að kraftmiklum og metnaðarfullum einstaklingum með brennandi áhuga á hugbúnaðargerð, viðskiptagreind, gervigreind, gagnavinnslu, tölfræði og sjálfvirknivæðingu.

Ef þú ert með bakgrunn í tölvunarfræði, hugbúnaðarverkfræði og/eða góða færni í forritun og með löngun til að taka þátt í verkefnum með mörgum af öflugustu fyrirtækjum á íslandi þá er þetta tækifæri fyrir þig.

jobs.title: Bakendaforritari
jobs.description:
Við leitum að reyndum bakendaforritara sem brennur fyrir að skapa traustan og notendavænan hugbúnað. Við bjóðum upp á lifandi, skemmtilegan og fjölskylduvænan vinnustað og ekki síst frábært teymi til að starfa með. Leitað er að kraftmiklum liðsauka í stækkandi teymi.

Hugbúnaðarþróun RÚV er framsækið teymi sem hefur frelsi til nýsköpunar og svigrúm til að prófa sig áfram með nýja tækni. Við vinnum í Agile vinnuumhverfi og þróum meðal annars lausnir sem þúsundir landsmanna nota á degi hverjum.
Umsóknarfrestur er til og með 12. nóvember 2023.

Nánari upplýsingar veitir Starkaður Örn Arnarson deildarstjóri hugbúnaðarþróunar, starkadur@ruv.is, s: 515 3000.

Umsóknum ásamt ferilskrá er skilað rafrænt með því að smella á hnappinn hér fyrir neðan. Valkvætt kynningarbréf og/eða GitHub prófíll er kostur.

Við hvetjum áhugasöm til að sækja um starfið, óháð kyni, uppruna, fötlun eða skertri starfsgetu.
jobs.bodyhtml:

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer (Web3 & Mobile)
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to work on our new unannounced project!

In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality open-source web3 and mobile applications. You will play a pivotal role in guiding the direction of our development efforts, ensuring that our applications remain scalable, maintainable, and cutting-edge while also delivering exceptional user experiences. The position is located in Reykjavík.

Your tasks:


 - Collaboratively leading a team of skilled and passionate professionals to co-create the infrastructure and build pipelines of a game world

 - Design and develop robust, scalable, observable, maintainable, and secure solutions including supporting tools

 - Writing maintainable, well tested, well documented, open-source solutions using the methodologies of infrastructure-as-code

 - Do code reviews to provide and receive constructive feedback for continuous improvement.


Your profile:


 - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Interaction Design, or a related field, or equivalent experience

 - 5+ years of experience in web2, mobile, and/or web3 application and library development, with a focus on React and TypeScript

 - Strong understanding of modern web development concepts, including responsive design, progressive web apps, single-page applications, and blockchain technologies

 - Strong knowledge of Design Thinking principles and UX best practices

 - English as a fluent second language

 - Excellent communication skills, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders


What we can offer you:


 - The inspiring opportunity of working on a pioneering project in cooperation with amazingly talented and enthusiastic colleagues.

 - A multicultural work environment that encourages growth, creativity, and innovation.

 - A flexible hybrid work environment with a dual workstation setup.

 - An employee led fun division that hosts regular events.

 - An excellent canteen offering a breakfast and lunch menu, along with drinks, snacks and discretionary weekly dinners.

 - Discretionary quarterly and annual performance sharing plans, complemented by an options-based incentive plan.

 - Annual sports grant, mobile phone and usage package, home internet, and a conditional monthly transportation grant.

 - A strong focus on employee well-being, with benefits such as a free on-site doctor and discounted access to a variety of on-site services, such as a gym, massage, hairdresser, beautician, car- and laundry services.

 - Vacation package in accordance with Icelandic labour law and customs.

 - A generous relocation package

jobs.title: Hugbúnaðarsérfræðingur
jobs.description:
Við erum að leita að metnaðarfullum og skemmtilegum einstaklingi með brennandi áhuga á stafrænni tækni.

Retric er öflugt þekkingarfyrirtæki sem sérhæfir sig í innleiðingu á Microsoft Dynamics 365, stafrænum lausnum og nýtingu Azure skýjalausna.

Við leggjum áherslu á gæði, góðan móral og erum sveigjanlegt fyrirtæki sem býður samkeppnishæf laun.

Mikilvægt að samskiptahæfileikar séu góðir þar sem starfið felur einnig í sér ráðgjöf og samskipti við viðskiptavini
Farið verður með allar umsóknir og fyrirspurnir sem trúnaðarmál.

Nánari upplýsingar um starfið veitir Ragnar Miguel ragnar@retric.is
jobs.bodyhtml:

Retric er öflugt þekkingarfyrirtæki sem sérhæfir sig í innleiðingu á Microsoft Dynamics 365, stafrænum lausnum og nýtingu Azure skýjalausna.

Við leggjum áherslu á gæði, góðan móral og erum sveigjanlegt fyrirtæki sem býður samkeppnishæf laun.

jobs.title: C++ Programmer
jobs.description:
CCP Iceland is looking for a talented C++ Programmer to support development of our proprietary multi-platform game engine.

The perfect candidate has experience in software development and thrives in a team environment which focuses on innovation and growth. The position is a full-time job based at the CCP headquarters in beautiful Reykjavik, Iceland.

Your tasks:


 - Investigating, planning, and implementing projects related to the health and capabilities of the game engine

 - Identifying performance issues, researching, and implementing solutions to resolve those bottlenecks

 - Contribute to all aspects of release and sprint planning with the ability to accurately estimate effort required

 - Maintaining and optimizing existing engine subsystems for all platforms

 - Designing and implementing new engine subsystems for all platforms

 - Debugging and bug fixing


Your Profile:


 - B.Sc in Software Engineering, Computer Science or related field

 - Minimum 3 years’ experience with software development

 - Good knowledge of C/C++ with some knowledge of Python

 - Familiar with modern software development practices such as CI/CD, SDK and middleware integration, version control and code reviews

 - Able to collaborate with colleagues to determine technical requirements of upcoming projects

 - Ability to meet deadlines while documenting and following best practices


What we can offer you:


 - The inspiring opportunity to work on pioneering projects in cooperation with talented and adventurous co-workers

 - A multicultural work environment that encourages growth, creativity, and innovation

 - Dual workstation setup and flexible work environment

 - An active fun club that hosts regular events

 - An excellent canteen that offers a weekly breakfast and lunch menu as well as drinks and snacks

 - Discretionary quarterly and annual performance sharing plan

 - Annual sports grant

 - A mobile phone as well as a mobile usage package

 - Home internet

 - A conditional monthly transportation grant

 - Work environment that focuses on employee well-being

 - On-site doctor, free of charge, as well as other on-site services at a discounted price

 - Relocation Package


All applications and related documents must be submitted in English to be valid.

All applicants should be prepared to provide code and work samples and/or set time aside for a test assignment.

  • Investigating, planning, and implementing projects related to the health and capabilities of the game engine

jobs.title: Sérfræðingur í sjálfvirknilausnum
jobs.description:
Við hjá Evolv leitum að starfskrafti sem er tilbúinn að ganga til liðs við okkar frábæra teymi sem hjálpar stærstu fyrirtækjum landsins að sjálfvirknivæða handvirka og tímafreka ferla. Starfið felst meðal annars í því að greina, smíða og innleiða hugbúnaðarlausnir sem nýtast viðskiptavinum Evolv í sinni sjálfvirknivegferð.

Evolv leitast við að bjóða upp á framúrskarandi þjónustu við sína viðskiptavini sem byggir á trausti, fagmennsku og skilningi á virði þeirra sjálfvirknilausna sem Evolv þróar í samvinnu við viðskiptavini.

Drífandi einstaklingar í leit að starfi sem býður upp á fjölbreytt verkefni, ábyrgð og tækifæri til að hafa áhrif á hverjum degi eru hvattir til að sækja um.



Evolv er þriggja ára gamalt hugbúnaðarfyrirtæki sem var stofnað árið 2020. Evolv sérhæfir sig í sjálfvirkum lausnum og hefur vaxið hratt á stuttum tíma enda hefur eftirspurnin eftir sjálfvirknivæðingu og krafa um nýtingu á starfsfólki aukist mikið.

Við leggjum áherslu á að vera sífellt að bæta við okkur þekkingu og bæta vinnubrögðin okkar og styðjum við það með tækifærum til símenntunar. Það að þú sért að vinna í fjölbreyttum verkefnum fyrir viðskiptavini Evolv sem starfa í ólíkum geirum gefur þér einnig stórt tækifæri til þess að auka þekkingu þína.

jobs.title: Hugbúnaðarprófari / QC Engineer
jobs.description:
Ert þú jákvæð, nákvæm og skipulögð manneskja og ert spennt fyrir að vinna í sjálfstæðu teymi að fjármálahugbúnaði framtíðarinnar? Þá erum við hjá Five Degrees að leita að þér til að framkvæma prófanir og tryggja rétta virkni hugbúnaðarkerfa okkar. Prófanirnar eru að miklu leyti sjálfvirkar og því er góð forritunarkunnátta nauðsynleg í starfinu.

Við nýtum okkur fyrst og fremst Microsoft tækni, svo sem Azure, .net, C# og SQL Server. Við prófanir notum við tól eins og Ready API, Postman, Selenium og Cypress.
 Við erum stöðugt að leita nýrra leiða til að gera hlutina betur. Þar vonumst við til að þú getir orðið okkur að liði.

Ef þú ert með háskólagráðu í tölvunarfræði, hugbúnaðarverkfræði eða sambærilegri grein, eða með mjög góða þekkingu og starfsreynslu af hugbúnaðarprófunum og þeirri tækni sem við notum þá hvetjum við þig til að sækja um starfið. Við hvetjum öll kyn til að sækja um.





Five Degrees á Íslandi

Five Degrees á Íslandi er leiðandi í gerð hugbúnaðar fyrir fjármálamarkað. Hugbúnaðurinn okkar er í notkun hjá flestum fyrirtækjum og stofnunum á íslenskum fjármálamarkaði. Hugbúnaðarlausnir Five Degrees einfalda alla umsýslu lána, verðbréfasafna, innlánsreikninga og greiðslusamninga.

Starfstöðvar á Íslandi eru tvær, í Kópavogi og á Akureyri. Á báðum stöðum er lagður mikill metnaður í gott starfsumhverfi og að verkefnin sem unnin eru séu bæði fjölbreytt og krefjandi.

Nánari upplýsingar: hr.iceland@fivedegrees.is

Tekið er á móti umsóknum í gegnum Alfreð.

jobs.title: Front End Developer
jobs.description:
Sportabler is looking for a Front End Engineer (Junior / Senior) to join us on our mission to change the future for generations to come.

Abler is an innovative and mission driven SaaS technology company specialising in operating systems for the sports industry. We are committed to delivering innovative digital solutions that enhance the lives of our users, create significant value for our customers, and ultimately drive social impact through sports.


We are a rapidly expanding, globally diverse team of over 20 individuals, each contributing a distinctive array of experiences and perspectives to our collective journey. We highly prioritise diversity in opinions and thinking, radical candor and commitment to the belief that collective strength of our team is the foundation of our achievements. Backed by exceptional investors and boasting a proven track record in our domestic market, we stand poised for successful expansion onto the international stage.

You will play an active role in improving our current product portfolio parallel to developing exciting new features.
If you're interested in the role and think you have what it takes to make an impact, please send your CV and cover letter to sportabler@sportabler.com. We encourage all genders to apply for this position.

All applications are treated with confidentiality.

jobs.title: Back End Developer
jobs.description:
Sportabler is looking for a Back End Engineer to join us on our mission to change the future for generations to come.

Abler is an innovative and mission driven SaaS technology company specialising in operating systems for the sports industry. We are committed to delivering innovative digital solutions that enhance the lives of our users, create significant value for our customers, and ultimately drive social impact through sports.


We are a rapidly expanding, globally diverse team of over 20 individuals, each contributing a distinctive array of experiences and perspectives to our collective journey. We highly prioritise diversity in opinions and thinking, radical candor and commitment to the belief that collective strength of our team is the foundation of our achievements. Backed by exceptional investors and boasting a proven track record in our domestic market, we stand poised for successful expansion onto the international stage.

As a Backend Developer, you will be responsible for developing, maintaining and scaling our web applications, API services and databases. You will be working alongside a team of developers, CTO and product managers to build innovative and robust backend systems that support our platform.
If you're interested in the role and think you have what it takes to make an impact, please send your CV and cover letter to sportabler@sportabler.com. We encourage all genders to apply for this position.

All applications are treated with confidentiality.

jobs.title: Experienced backend developer
jobs.description:
Vettvangur is on the hunt for an extraordinary backend developer to take the helm of some of Iceland's most cutting-edge web projects.

[Are WE outstanding enough for YOU? Find out here]

Qualifications

Our ideal team member has:


 - 

a solid background in .NET


 - 

good experience with Microsoft SQL databases


 - 

great project management skills


 - 

good experience with developing, releasing and iterating on solutions



Experience with the following Microsoft solutions is a plus for you:


 - 

Azure


 - 

DevOps



Is This You?


 - 

You craft elegant and maintainable code.


 - 

Teamwork is your middle name, and you have exceptional communication skills.


 - 

You are solution-oriented, always willing to share your knowledge and insights.


 - 

While experience is a must, a formal degree in a relevant field is a considerable plus.


 - 

You are upfront, open and frank (ok, this is more of a good nice-to-have)..



Vettvangur - A Place for Growth

Do you come alive working on complex, varied projects? Do you yearn for a workspace where your voice isn't just heard but valued? In our pond, there are no small fish—just big talents and zero predators.

Our inviting and close-knit office is a hub for 18+ gifted developers, designers, and content creators.

What's On Offer:


 - 

Stimulating projects that will supercharge your coding portfolio.


 - 

Competitive remuneration and perks.


 - 

Annual team adventures to world-class cities.


 - 

An annual allowance of up to 150,000 ISK for international seminars.


 - 

An unparalleled working environment with sweeping views from our Suðurlandsbraut office.



Our Esteemed Clientele

Among our satisfied customers are some of Iceland’s top businesses and public institutions: Domino's, Lyfja, Veritas, Innnes, Eimskip, Netgíró, Hugverkastofan, Reykjavíkurborg, Heilsuvera, and the list goes on.




We assure utmost confidentiality throughout the application process.

Why should you join us? Read all about it here.

Qualifications

  • a solid background in .NET

  • good experience with Microsoft SQL databases

  • great project management skills

  • good experience with developing, releasing and iterating on solutions
